channel.title: JD Radio
channel.description:
JD Radio Has been broadcasting since early 2009 on podOmatic a couple of months ago we produced 2 live shows which were fairly successful and got a couple of hundred listeners.
JD Radio aims to provide you with more variety than any other podcast on the internet (in our opinion) whether or not that is the genre of music or the topics we are discussing.
Please help us by donating as much as you can, this will only be used to develop future shows, and no donation is too small whether it is 1p or £10 anything can and will help, you can donate by finding the link below, or by sending money via paypal or a credit or debit card to orders@jdradio.com.
Please visit our website frequently by typing in:
http://www.jdradio.com http://jdunsigned.com
Follow us on Twitter and MySpace:
http://www.twitter.com/jdradi0 http://www.myspace.com/realjdradio
Comment as much as you like contact us about anything you want, you can do this by emailing:
info@jdradio.com
Enjoy the Shows!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music, Movies, Televison, Comedy And A Whole Lotta Fun, With Dylan Mcallister And Jennifer Sharp

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #9 - Musical Heaven!
item.description: We are introducing... one of our special shows, where we are taking it back to the drawing board... and giving you 20 minutes of none stop music! With artists from the likes of King's Of Leon, Cascada, Florence and The Machine, Madonna and much much more, don't forget to miss out on this Musical Heaven extravaganza!! Please remember to start subscribing... and get Downloading!!

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #6 - New Age
item.description: After the several months of absence JD Radio is back and better than ever, we are kicking thing's off with a special host who wouldn't normally feature in an episode with his very mischievous brother our very own Dylan the main host of the show. This incredible episode features amazing chart topper's with songs from the likes of Chipmunk and the Black Eyed Peas (B.E.P). A very special Hashell stops by to tell us about her relatively new single Worthless, hear it on JD Radio before anywhere else. And we are back with our very special Top 10 Chart, can you really afford to miss all of this, as usual you are one click away from hearing the antics that go on between the hosts behind the microphone, hear the new episode now! As always comments are welcome. Please take the time to follow us on Twitter Where we have over 600 Follower's you can tweet us too by going to: http://www.twitter.com/jdradi0 And give us a search in Facebook and iTunes with 'JD Radio' where we now have over 100 Fans! Whooooo! ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: JD Radio

As always comments are welcome. Please take the time to follow us on Twitter Where we have over 600 Follower's you can tweet us too by going to:

And give us a search in Facebook and iTunes with 'JD Radio' where we now have over 100 Fans! Whooooo! ENJOY!

item.title: Season #1 - Live Episode #1 - Episode #6 - Live In 5
item.description: JD Radio Launches LIVE From The United Kingdom! Please Note; After The JD Radio Jingle Plays, There Is A Short 1 Minute Gap, This Is Due To The Host Having Problems Logging On To The System! We have fast tracked our training and we have skipped our 15 minute introduction show, so join us live as we attempt our first ever live show from the heart of Sunderland in our excellent studio which of course is located in the great U.K. Listen to this show for the run down on the official album, singles and dance charts thanks to the Official U.K. Charts Company. This Episode Features amazing unsigned artists from the likes of: Nicola Sipprell, Sasha Eleyce, Fortune And Glory And Rubick! Our Co-Host Jennifer Sharp is unavailable on tonight's show as we were having problems logging her on, but stay tuned with Dylan Mcallister and listen to his antics and ramblings as well as the host of some great music. Stay Tuned For More Music, More Movies More Entertainment And Much Much More! We Are Open To Comments And Friend Requests, And You Can Even Send Us Some Tweets On Twitter, We Will Be Happy To To Tweet Back. http://www.twitter.com/jdradi0

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #5 - Deserted
item.description: Dylan Mcallister goes it alone and hosts the fifth episode of the 10 show season, expect comedy, banter, music, movies and even better chit chat. Have a listen to brilliant unsigned artists from the likes of the amazingly talented Liz Reynolds, and the hugely popular Nicola Sipprell. JD Radio is currently half way through the first season, when the season is complete JD Radio will have been broadcasting for almost one year, celebrate with us in upcoming pre-recorded and live shows from Podomatic central and blogtalkradio: http://www.blogtalkradio.com/jdradiolive http://www.jdradio.com http://www.twitter.com/jdradi0

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #4 - The Short One
item.description: The fourth episode of JD Radio features the latest news and gossip from the worlds press, Britain's Got Talent and The Eurovision Song Contest 2009, as well as comedy and general banter. Don't miss a review of the new released Movie Angels And Demons and relax with breathtaking music from the likes of Lily Allen, Beyonce and MGMT. Take the time to listen to our short but sweet podcast and get involved, get subscribing and get downloading. Check out our website at www.jdradio.com for updates and information on current and forthcoming podcasts.

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #3 - The Lengthy One
item.description: Very special feature length and comedy episode of JD Radio, special guests including, Jade Louise Blair, Liam Newton, And Anonymous Impersonator Of Worzel Gummidge, You Will Be Mad To Miss This Episode You Even Get To Hear Us Singing... Keep in the loop @ www.jdradio.com

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #2 - Let's Get Personal
item.description: Hello, and welcome to a very special dance and upbeat edition of JD Radio, the very best in dance acts are coming your way, stay tuned for awesome banter, great movie reviews and even better music, keep track of all our recent podcasts at http://www.jdradio.com, download and subscribe in itunes today... You'll Be Mad To Miss Out... Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/jdradi0

item.title: Season #1 - Episode #1 - The Begginer's
item.description: The first episode of JD Radio had finally arrived, it is jam-packed full of entertainment, movies and comedy. With music from Lady Gaga, Lily Allen and James Morrison You'll be mad to miss out. Please Note: If you don't download this episode, you will be mad, follow us on facebook and become a fan of JD Radio today, by visiting: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=59015426517&ref=ts#/pages/Sunderland/JD-Radio/97891959487?ref=ts Just find the link that says 'Become A Fan' click it and you are done :)
